title: Kate Beckinsale, 46, displays her incredible physique as she larks around in lingerie at home
text:
She is quite the joker on social media.

And Kate Beckinsale was up to her old tricks once more on Tuesday as she took to Instagram to share a hilarious series of snaps while frolicking in her underwear.

The Underworld star, 46, looked incredible in a series of snaps as she larked about before revealing she had been shopping for Halloween decorations.

Kate looked sensational as she larked around in her underwear - complete with a black bandeau bra, matching knickers and untied shorts.

She wore her hair pushed back with a hairband while seemingly going make-up free to prove she was truly in relaxation mode.

In true US-style, Kate revealed she was preparing herself for Halloween, yet revealed she had left her decor till late so go a discount.

She added a caption on the series of silly poses reading: 'Won’t lie, got over excited when I went to go buy Halloween decorations so late and everything was 60% off so it turns out I’m not actually crap, I’m thrifty'.

Kate hit the headlines earlier this year for her now-ended romance with 25-year-old Saturday Night Live funnyman Pete Davidson.

Pete was hot on the heels of his high-profile broken engagement to pop star Ariana Grande, who recently released the smash hit breakup album Thank U, Next.

Kate and Pete's relationship went public when they were spotted kissing in the stands at a hockey game in New York City on March 2.

The big revelation occurred one day after the first season of Kate's new drama show The Widow dropped on Amazon Prime.
